text: A majority of the organizers or initial directors of a limited cooperative association that has not yet begun business activity or the conduct of its affairs may dissolve the association.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 1204 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act . See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-1012.04

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Voluntary dissolution before commencement of activity.
